about_the_game:
Step into the world of JASON: Coming of Age and experience the beginning of his journey through exclusive scenes. Follow Jason during his first hours of adventure, meet his friends Lexie and Marvin, and uncover his past as well as the motivations that will shape his path.

This demo offers a comprehensive preview of the game's features, allowing you to get a taste of its mechanics before diving deeper:

🔹 A complete tutorial for a smooth introduction.
🔹 Various gameplay modes: exploration, searching for key elements in scenes, and switching to free roam mode with a clean interface.
🔹 A dynamic messaging system with a conversation history.
🔹 Time management mechanics: some actions will require strategic planning.
🔹 A character menu featuring Love Interests (LI) and key figures: beyond romance, important and secondary characters also play a role, each with their own stats and attributes.
🔹 A detailed player stats system, tracking Jason’s development throughout the game.
🔹 An original and immersive soundtrack, composed exclusively for the game.
🔹 Breathtaking visuals, enhancing every scene and strengthening the storytelling.

📌 Playtime: Players who explore all available content can expect about 1 hour of gameplay (tested on the French version).

This demo is just a glimpse into Chapter One of JASON, which lays the foundation of the game, introduces the main storyline, and opens up countless possibilities for future exploration and evolution within Jason’s universe. Dive into his story now and get ready for an immersive journey!

content_descriptors.notes:
Unlike the full game, this demo contains very little adult content. The only instances of nudity are mainly decorative elements that fit within a light erotic context, without any explicit scenes.

Notable content includes:

    Erotic-themed illustrations and decorative objects.
    Partial nudity, exclusively focused on eroticism and female breasts.

This demo does not include any explicit sexual scenes, nor violent or disturbing content. It remains accessible to players who wish to explore the game's universe without exposure to strong adult material.

Step into the world of JASON: Coming of Age and experience the beginning of his journey through exclusive scenes. Follow Jason during his first hours of adventure, meet his friends Lexie and Marvin, and uncover his past as well as the motivations that will shape his path.

This demo offers a comprehensive preview of the game's features, allowing you to get a taste of its mechanics before diving deeper:

This demo is just a glimpse into Chapter One of JASON, which lays the foundation of the game, introduces the main storyline, and opens up countless possibilities for future exploration and evolution within Jason’s universe. Dive into his story now and get ready for an immersive journey!
legal_notice:
The music used in this game is copyrighted. All usage licenses have been legally obtained through Storyblocks.com. No reproduction, distribution, or use of the music in this game is allowed without explicit permission from the rights holders.

The images and videos in the game, as well as the story, are the exclusive property of Coeur de Cochon. Any reproduction, modification, or distribution without prior authorization is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action.
name: JASON, Coming of Age Demo
short_description: Experience the beginning of JASON: Coming of Age in this exclusive demo. Explore his world, meet his friends, and try out key mechanics, from free roam mode to dynamic messaging. A glimpse into Chapter One, setting the stage for countless possibilities ahead!
